column3: Latest;Siem Reap: The Siem Reap Provincial Court will begin proceedings against two Japanese nationals who are accused of murdering a taxi driver and attempting to steal his vehicle.------The ------shocking crime------ took place on May 17
column4: 2019 in Siem Reap province. Him Chan
column5: a father of 4 had his throat cut in Pouk district when driving the pair to Siem Reap town.------Ishida Reimon and Nakakuri Ryuji
column7: are charged with ------premeditated murder.------It is not yet known how they intend to plea.
